siteMetadata.title: Sam Does Blogs
siteMetadata.subtitle: Samuel Chan blogs here about the geekier parts of his life.

frontmatter.title: There has to be a better way to work with lists
frontmatter.description: Working with IBM BPM lists isn't very JavaScript-y at all. What if there's a better (and faster) way?

frontmatter.title: Initialising Business Objects, The Better Way
frontmatter.description: IBM BPM uses JavaScript as the scripting language, but do you know how to make the most out of it in your projects?
